ARABIC: يُرِيدُونَ أَن يَخْرُجُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلنَّارِ وَمَا هُم بِخَٰرِجِينَ مِنْهَا وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ مُّقِيمٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They will want to get out of the Fire but they will not be able to. They will have an everlasting punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They would like to escape from the Fire, but will never succeed, and their suffering will be constant
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They will wish to come out of the Fire, but they will not. Theirs will be a long-lasting chastisement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They will wish to get out of the fire but they will not have such a choice. Their torment will be constant.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They will wish to come out of hell, and will not come out of it – and for them is an unending punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They will long to get out of the Fire, but never will they get out therefrom; and theirs will be a lasting torment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: They would desire to go forth from the fire, and they shall not go forth from it, and they shall have a lasting punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They will desire to come forth from the Fire, but they will not come forth from it; for them awaits a lasting chastisement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: They will wish to come forth from the Fire, but they will not come forth from it. Theirs will be a lasting doom.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They will want to get out of the Fire but they will be unable to do so: theirs shall be a lasting punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: They will desire to come forth from the Fire, but they shall not be able to come forth therefrom, and theirs shall be a torment lasting.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They would long to leave the Fire, but they shall never leave it, and there is a lasting punishment for them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Their wish will be to get out of the Fire, but never will they get out therefrom: their penalty will be one that endures.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They will long to get out of the Fire, but never will they get out therefrom, and theirs will be a lasting torment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They will wish to get out of the Fire, but they shall not, theirs shall be a lasting punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They will want to leave the Fire, but they will not leave it. For them is a lasting punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They will wish to get out of the Fire, but never are they to emerge therefrom, and for them is an enduring punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [5:37] They will desire, they will wish, to exit from the Fire, but they will not exit from it; theirs shall be a lasting, a perpetual, chastisement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (They will wish to come forth from the Fire) by changing one state into another, (but they will not come forth from it) from the Fire. (Theirs will be a lasting doom) which will never be interrupted.
